XDG user directories - archilinux > echo $XDG_ $XDG_DATA_DIRS $XDG_RUNTIME_DIR > man xdg-user-dirs-update # xdg-user-dirs-update - Update XDG user dir configuration > man xdg-user-dir # xdg-user-dir - Find an XDG user dir > xdg-user-dir DESKTOP > cat /etc/xdg/user-dirs.
